colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @042A*, ,CES KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I 'KHRUNGS GNAS GDAN SA CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI GDAN RABS MU TIG 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHRI THOG SO GSUM PA LUNG DANG RTOGS PA'I YONG TAN GYI DPAL LA DANG 'BYOR BA'I MKHAN CHEN CHE SHOS NGAG DBANG BSTAN PAS MDZOD GTAGS DNGUL GYI MAndAL BCAS BSUL NGOR, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I 'PHAR PA ZHES PA LCAGS MO GLANG GI LONG CHOS SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O,,
